text: Rumors persist about Brad Pitt dating Neri Oxman. In fact, one recent report states that the actor planned to take the MIT professor to a family wedding. However, Gossip Cop recently reported that they debunked the rumor that Brad Pitt planned to take Neri Oxman home to meet his family. While headlines scream that Pitt feels torn between his ex - wife Jennifer Aniston, who recently ended her marriage with Justin Theroux, and Oxman, he ’ s chosen the architect and wants to introduce her to his mother and siblings. Not only that, but the gossip magazines already have Pitt, a father of six — including Maddox, 16, Pax, 14, Zahara, 13, Shiloh, 11, and 9 - year - old twins Knox and
